data.title: The Royal Watcher
data.text:
Queen Sirikit’s Emerald Flower Earrings

Happy Birthday to Queen Sirikit of Thailand, who is celebrating her 92nd Birthday today! The glamorous Princess who became the popular Thai Queen Consort for almost 70 years and is now the much respected Queen Mother, Queen Sirikit possesses an incredible jewellery collection, which includes these Emerald Flower Earrings!

Continue reading →

Royal Events Today

Church at Balmoral Castle

King Charles III and Queen Camilla attended the annual Sunday Service at Crathie Kirk near Balmoral Castle on August 11th, during their annual stay on the Balmoral Estate in the Scottish Highlands.

Continue reading →

Engagement of Princess Madeleine of Sweden and Jonas Bergström

The Swedish Royal Court announced theEngagement of Princess Madeleine of Sweden and Jonas Bergström at Solliden Palace on the Island of Öland on this day in 2009, 15 years ago, which ended after he was caught cheating.

Continue reading →

Royal Events Today

Royalty at 2024 Olympics

Royal Guests and Heads of State from around the world are attending the 2024 Paris Olympics these past two weeks, following theOpening Ceremony, a Gala Dinner at the Louvre and a Reception hosted by French President Emmanuel Macron. Continue reading →

Royal Holiday in Norway, 1969

The Norwegian Royal Family hosted the British Royal Family in Bergen on this day in 1969, 55 years ago, during their Holiday in Norway on the Royal Yacht Britannia. The British and Norwegian Royal Families have had a long and close family relationship for over a century.

Continue reading →

Royal Events Today

Baroness Helle Reedtz-Thott’s Tiara

Happy Birthday to Baroness Helle Reedtz-Thott, who turns 50 today! The Danish Lawyer and Chatelaine of Gavnø Castle who is a close friend of Queen Mary of Denmark and a godmother of Prince Vincent, Baroness Helle Reedtz-Thott acquired this striking Pearl and Diamond Tiara at Sotheby’s in 2018!

Continue reading →
